summary: Comprehensive testing of Banner Management System for Paridhaan Creations e-commerce platform. All 28 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend banner display verified for all 9 placements. Hero, category_header, category_sidebar, category_footer, and product_page banners display correctly. Some placements (below_hero, popup, cart_page, checkout_page) have no active banners in database but API endpoints work correctly.

tests: GET /api/uploads/{filename} serves files with cache headers - PASS
GET /api/uploads/{filename} returns 404 for missing files - PASS
Homepage hero slider displays 2 banners with navigation - PASS
Category page header banner displays correctly - PASS
Category page sidebar banner displays correctly - PASS
Category page footer banner displays correctly - PASS
Product detail page banner displays correctly - PASS
Cart page banner section exists (no active banners) - PASS
Checkout page banner section exists (no active banners) - PASS

critical_code_review_comments: All 9 banner placements are properly implemented in both backend and frontend
Image upload supports JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF formats with 5MB limit
getImageUrl helper correctly handles both external URLs and local /api/uploads/ paths
Lazy loading is implemented for banner images
Session-based popup tracking prevents repeated popup display

test_credentials.note: No admin credentials needed for public banner testing

seed_data_creation: Used existing banners in database. No new test data created.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Banner Management System fully functional. All 9 placements (hero, below_hero, popup, category_header, category_sidebar, category_footer, product_page, cart_page, checkout_page) are implemented. Currently active banners: hero(2), category_header(4), category_sidebar(5), category_footer(4), product_page(1). Placements with no active banners: below_hero, popup, cart_page, checkout_page - these work correctly but have no banners uploaded. Admin can add banners via /admin panel. Image upload at /api/upload/image supports JPEG/PNG with 5MB limit.
